item.title: 홍진영 - Girl In The Mirror (Feat.Frawley)
item.description:
작곡: Dino Med.., Dotter / 작사: .., Dotter, 갓떼리C
KY: 29053

I catch a glimpse
of her eyes every day
Sometimes we talk
in the hallway
She gives me words
of affirmation ah
Doesn’t shy
with her affection ha
Looks good in make up
or nothing at all
She wears her scars
like souvenirs
Shines brighter than
the constellations ha
What a wonderful
creation
She looks just like
the girl I wanna be
The way her body moves
I can’t look away
She lo-lo-lo-lo-loves
herself
Don’t care
what they say
50 shades of nude
she’s made of glitter
Oh I think I’m falling
for the girl
The girl
in the mirror
In the mirror
in the mirror
The girl the girl
in the mirror
In the mirror
in the mirror
The girl the girl
in the mirror
And when I know that
she’s been feeling low
Even the bags
under her eyes
Are filled with gold
she is perfection ah
What a beautiful
reflection
She looks
just like
The wonder
of my dreams yeah
The way her body moves
I can’t look away
She lo-lo-lo-lo-loves
herself
Don’t care
what they say
50 shades of nude
she’s made of glitter
Oh I think I’m falling
for the girl
The girl
in the mirror
In the mirror
in the mirror
The girl the girl
in the mirror
In the mirror
in the mirror
The girl the girl
in the mirror
She looks just like
the girl I wanna be oh
The way her body moves
I can’t look away
She lo-lo-lo-lo-loves
herself
Don’t care
what they say
50 shades of nude
she’s made of glitter
Oh I think I’m falling
for the girl
The girl

The girl the girl
